metadata.title: CVE-2018-7263 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The mad_decoder_run() function in decoder.c in Underbit libmad through0.15.1b allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (SIGABRTbecause of double free or corruption) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a crafted file. NOTE: this may overlap CVE-2017-11552.

criterions.comment: mpg321: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
